results.title: Metformin Ameliorates Inflammation and Airway Remodeling of Experimental Allergic Asthma in Mice by Restoring AMPKalpha Activity

results.title: Metformin regulates the effects of IR and IGF-1R methylation on mast cell activation and airway reactivity in diabetic rats with asthma through miR-152-3p/DNMT1 axis.
results.text_hl: This study aimed at ascertaining the downstream molecules underlying the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on the activation of mast cells (MCs) and airway reactivity in a concomitant @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Status_Asthmaticus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013224 @@@asthmatic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ model.

results.title: Metformin reduces airway inflammation and remodeling via activation of AMP-activated protein kinase.
